    Counter<T>

    public final class HashCounter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Counter<T>
    This method provides a counter based on a HashMap.

      • toMap

        public java.util.Map<T,java.lang.Integer> toMap()
        This method creates map that maps a value to the number of times it was counted.

        A count may be negative, if more subtractions occurred than additions.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
